parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Converts position from object model space to world space in render time scope. For ASL version see [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]].

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> object '''modelToWorldVisual''' modelPos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modelPos: [[Array]] - in format [[PositionRelative]] ([x,y,z] offset relative to the model centre)

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - world position in format [[PositionAGL]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_aboveAndBehindPlayer = [[player]] [[modelToWorldVisual]] [0,-1,3];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[modelToWorld]], [[vectorModelToWorldVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]], [[worldToModelVisual]], [[worldToModel]], [[selectionPosition]]
</value></part></template></root>
